name: Gab

values.name: bodyToString
values.comment: Debugging function for displaying a request body.
values.type: Basics.Int -> Gab.Types.HttpBody -> String.String

values.name: doParts
values.comment:
Shared by doUsersParts and doPostParts

    doParts prefix operation decoder wrapper token identifier undo

`prefix` can be "users" or "posts".

If `undo` is `True`, does a DELETE. Otherwise, does a POST.
values.type: String.String -> String.String -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: doPostsParts
values.comment:
Shared by upvotePostParts, downvotePostParts, repostParts

    doPostsParts operation decoder wrapper token username undo

`operation` can be "upvote", "downvote" or "repost".
values.type: String.String -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: doUsersParts
values.comment:
Shared by followUserParts and muteUserParts

    doUsersParts operation decoder wrapper token username undo

`operation` can be "follow" or "mute".
values.type: String.String -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: downvotePost
values.comment:
Downvote or undownvote a post. Return value not interesting.

    downvotePost wrapper token postid undownvote

This will return an Http `BadStatus` error if you you're not
authorized to downvote.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Success -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: downvotePostParts
values.comment:
Downvote or undownvote a post, with a custom decoder.

    downvotePostParts decoder wrapper token postid undownvote
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: followUser
values.comment:
Follow or unfollow a user. Return value not interesting.

    followUser wrapper token username unfollow
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Success -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: followUserParts
values.comment:
Follow or unfollow a user, with a custom decoder.

    followUserParts decoder wrapper token username unfollow
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: gabApiUri
values.comment: The base URI for GAB API requests. Automatically prepended to `path` args.
values.type: String.String

values.name: getParts
values.comment:
Simple HTTP GET request. Empty body, no custom headers.

    get decoder wrapper token wrapper path
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: getPost
values.comment:
Get a single post.

    getPost wrapper token postid
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Post -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getPostParts
values.comment:
Get a single post, using a custom decoder.

    getPostParts decoder wrapper token postid
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: groupFeed
values.comment:
Return posts for a group feed.

    groupFeed wrapper token group before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.

This is a guess at what this API command will look like. It doesn't yet exist.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.ActivityLogList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: groupFeedParts
values.comment:
Return posts for a group feed, using a custom decoder.

    groupFeedParts decoder wrapper token groupid before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.

This is a guess at what this API command will look like. It doesn't yet exist.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: homeFeed
values.comment:
Return posts in the home feed.

    homeFeed wrapper token before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.ActivityLogList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: homeFeedParts
values.comment:
Return posts in the home feed, using a custom encoder.

    homeFeedParts decoder wrapper token before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: me
values.comment: Return the logged-in user's profile information as a User record.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.User -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: meParts
values.comment: Return the logged-in user's profile information, using a custom decoder.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: muteUser
values.comment:
Mute or unmute a user. Return value not interesting.

    muteUser wrapper token username unmute

This isn't currently implemented by the API, but I expect that to change.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Success -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: muteUserParts
values.comment:
Mute or unmute a user, with a custom decoder.

    muteUserParts decoder wrapper token username unmute

This isn't currently implemented by the API, but I expect that to change.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: newPost
values.comment: Posting uses JSON, which is not in the spec, but is what the web client does.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.ActivityLog -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Gab.Types.PostForm -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: newPostParts
values.comment: Create a new post with a custom decoder.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Gab.Types.PostForm -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: notifications
values.comment:
Return notifications for the logged in user.

    notifications wrapper token before

For notifications, the `before` parameter is a notification ID, not a date.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.NotificationsLog -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: notificationsParts
values.comment:
Return notifications, using a custom decoder.

    notificationsParts decoder wrapper token before

For notifications, the `before` parameter is a notification ID, not a date.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: popularFeed
values.comment:
Return the posts in the "popular" feed, as a ActivityLogList.

    popularFeed wrapper token
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.ActivityLogList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: popularFeedParts
values.comment:
Return the posts in the "popular" feed, using a custom decoder.

    popularFeedParts decoder wrapper token
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: popularUsers
values.comment:
Return a list of popular users, as a UserList record.

    popularUsers wrapper token
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.UserList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: popularUsersParts
values.comment:
Return a list of popular users, using a custom decoder.

    popularUserParts wrapper decoder token
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: postImage
values.comment:
Posting an image.

The `String` that comes back is a media ID, to be used in `PostForm.media_attachments`.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error String.String -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> File.File -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: postImageParts
values.comment: Post an image with a custom decoder
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> File.File -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: repost
values.comment:
Repost or unrepost. Return value not interesting.

    repost wrapper token postid unrepost
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Success -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: repostParts
values.comment:
Repost or unrepost, with a custom decoder.

    repostParts decoder wrapper token postid unrepost
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: request
values.comment: Turn parts into a ready-to-send `Cmd msg`.
values.type: Gab.Types.RequestParts msg -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: requestParts
values.comment:
General-purpose `Http.Request` constructor.

    request method headers wrapper token path body decoder

`method` is the Http method, e.g. "GET".

`headers` is a list of custom `Http.Header`s.

`wrapper` maps a `Result` to a `msg`.

`token` is an OAuth token, often gotten with [`billstclair/elm-oauth-middleware`](http://package.elm-lang.org/packages/billstclair/elm-oauth-middleware/latest).

`path` is the path to the API endpoint, with NO leading slash.

`decoder` is a JSON decoder for the result.
values.type: String.String -> List.List Http.Header -> Gab.Types.HttpBody -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: savedTokenFromResponseToken
values.comment:
Convert an `OAuthMiddleWare.ResponseToken` to `Gab.Types.SavedToken`.

Use `Gab.EncodeDecode.savedTokenEncoder` and `Gab.EncodeDecode.savedTokenDecoder` to persist it.
values.type: Time.Posix -> OAuthMiddleware.ResponseToken.ResponseToken -> Gab.Types.SavedToken

values.name: upvotePost
values.comment:
Upvote or unupvote a post. Return value not interesting.

    upvotePost wrapper token postid unupvote
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.Success -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: upvotePostParts
values.comment:
Upvote or unupvote a post, with a custom decoder.

    upvotePostParts decoder wrapper token postid unupvote
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Bool -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: userFeed
values.comment:
Return posts for a user feed.

    userFeed wrapper token user before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.ActivityLogList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: userFeedParts
values.comment:
Return posts for a user feed, using a custom decoder.

    userFeedParts decoder wrapper user token before

The posts returned will have dates before `before`. Pass the empty string to get the beginning of the list.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: userFollowers
values.comment:
Return the logged-in user's followers as a UserList record.

    userFollowers wrapper token username before

`before` is the number of following users to skip before the listing starts. This enables scrolling through a long list.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.UserList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Int -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: userFollowersParts
values.comment:
Return the logged-in user's followers, using a custom decoder.

    userFollowersParts wrapper decoder token username before

`before` is the number of following users to skip before the listing starts. This enables scrolling through a long list.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Int -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: userFollowing
values.comment:
Return a list of users following the logged-in user, as a UserList record.

    userFollowing wrapper token username before

`before` is the number of followers to skip before the listing starts. This enables scrolling through a long list.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.UserList -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Int -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: userFollowingParts
values.comment:
Return a list of users following the logged-in user, using a custom decoder.

    userFollowingParts wrapper decoder token username before

`before` is the number of followers to skip before the listing starts. This enables scrolling through a long list.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Basics.Int -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

values.name: userProfile
values.comment: Return the logged-in user's profile information as a User record.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error Gab.Types.User -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: userProfileParts
values.comment: Return the logged-in user's profile information, using a custom decoder.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder a -> (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> OAuth.Token -> String.String -> Gab.Types.RequestParts msg

name: Gab.EncodeDecode

values.name: activityLogDecoder
values.comment: Decode an `ActivityLog`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.ActivityLog

values.name: activityLogEncoder
values.comment: Encode an `ActivityLog`.
values.type: Gab.Types.ActivityLog -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: activityLogListDecoder
values.comment: Decode an `ActivityLogList`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.ActivityLogList

values.name: activityLogListEncoder
values.comment: Encode an `ActivityLogList`.
values.type: Gab.Types.ActivityLogList -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: mediaIdDecoder
values.comment: Decode the ID that comes back from a `media-attachments/xxx` post.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder String.String

values.name: mediaIdEncoder
values.comment: Encode the ID that comes back from a `media-attachments/xxx` post.
values.type: String.String -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: notificationDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `Notification`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.Notification

values.name: notificationEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `Notification`.
values.type: Gab.Types.Notification -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: notificationTypeDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `NotificationType`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.NotificationType

values.name: notificationTypeEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `NotificationType`.
values.type: Gab.Types.NotificationType -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: notificationsLogDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `NotificationsLog`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.NotificationsLog

values.name: notificationsLogEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `NotificationsLog`.
values.type: Gab.Types.NotificationsLog -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: postDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `Post`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.Post

values.name: postEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `Post`.
values.type: Gab.Types.Post -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: postFormEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `PostForm`. No decoder ever used, so none defined.
values.type: Gab.Types.PostForm -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: postListDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `PostList`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.PostList

values.name: postListEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `PostList`.
values.type: Gab.Types.PostList -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: savedTokenDecoder
values.comment: Decode a persistent token.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.SavedToken

values.name: savedTokenEncoder
values.comment: Encode a persistent token.
values.type: Gab.Types.SavedToken -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: successDecoder
values.comment:
Decode a successful completion object.

Returned from operations with nothing else of use to report.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.Success

values.name: successEncoder
values.comment:
Encode a successful completion object.

Returned from operations with nothing else of use to report.
values.type: Gab.Types.Success -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: userDecoder
values.comment: Decode a `User`.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.User

values.name: userEncoder
values.comment: Encode a `User`.
values.type: Gab.Types.User -> Json.Encode.Value

values.name: userListDecoder
values.comment: Decode a list of `User`s.
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Gab.Types.UserList

values.name: userListEncoder
values.comment: Encode a list of `User`s.
values.type: Gab.Types.UserList -> Json.Encode.Value

name: Gab.Types

unions.name: HttpBody
unions.comment: A custom type for request bodies.

unions.name: PostResultState
unions.comment: The value of `PostResult.state` for a successful operation.

aliases.name: ActivityLog
aliases.comment: One element of the list returned from the feed reading functions.
aliases.type: { id : String.String, published_at : String.String, type_ : String.String, actuser : Gab.Types.User, post : Gab.Types.Post }

aliases.name: ActivityLogList
aliases.type: { data : List.List Gab.Types.ActivityLog, no_more : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: CategoryDetails
aliases.type: { title : String.String, slug : String.String, value : Basics.Int, emoji : String.String }

aliases.name: Embed
aliases.type: { html : String.String, iframe : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: Group
aliases.type: { id : String.String, title : String.String, pinned_post_id : String.String, cover_url : String.String, description : String.String, is_private : Basics.Bool, is_joined : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: MediaRecord
aliases.type: { id : String.String, url_thumbnail : String.String, url_full : String.String, width : Basics.Int, height : Basics.Int }

aliases.name: Notification
aliases.type: { id : String.String, created_at : String.String, url : String.String, type_ : Gab.Types.NotificationType, message : String.String, read : Basics.Bool, post : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.Post, actuser : Gab.Types.User }

aliases.name: NotificationsLog
aliases.type: { data : List.List Gab.Types.Notification, no_more : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: Post
aliases.comment: One post returned from one of the feed reader functions.
aliases.type: { id : String.String, created_at : String.String, revised_at : Maybe.Maybe String.String, edited : Basics.Bool, body : String.String, body_html : Maybe.Maybe String.String, body_html_summary : Maybe.Maybe String.String, body_html_summary_truncated : Basics.Bool, only_emoji : Basics.Bool, liked : Basics.Bool, disliked : Basics.Bool, bookmarked : Basics.Bool, repost : Basics.Bool, reported : Basics.Bool, score : Basics.Int, like_count : Basics.Int, dislike_count : Basics.Int, reply_count : Basics.Int, repost_count : Basics.Int, is_quote : Basics.Bool, is_reply : Basics.Bool, is_replies_disabled : Basics.Bool, embed : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.Embed, attachment : Gab.Types.Attachment, category : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, category_details : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.CategoryDetails, language : Maybe.Maybe String.String, nsfw : Basics.Bool, is_premium : Basics.Bool, is_locked : Basics.Bool, user : Gab.Types.User, group : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.Group, topic : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.Topic, related : Gab.Types.RelatedPosts }

aliases.name: PostForm
aliases.type: { body : String.String, reply_to : Maybe.Maybe String.String, is_quote : Basics.Bool, is_html : Basics.Bool, nsfw : Basics.Bool, is_premium : Basics.Bool, gif : Maybe.Maybe String.String, topic : Maybe.Maybe String.String, group : Maybe.Maybe String.String, media_attachments : List.List String.String, premium_min_tier : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, poll : Basics.Bool, poll_option_1 : Maybe.Maybe String.String, poll_option_2 : Maybe.Maybe String.String, poll_option_3 : Maybe.Maybe String.String, poll_option_4 : Maybe.Maybe String.String }

aliases.name: PostList
aliases.type: List.List Gab.Types.Post

aliases.name: PostResult
aliases.comment: Returned from the Post and Delete actions
aliases.type: { state : Gab.Types.PostResultState, message : String.String }

aliases.name: RequestParts
aliases.type: { method : String.String, headers : List.List Http.Header, url : String.String, body : Gab.Types.HttpBody, expect : Http.Expect msg, timeout : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, tracker : Maybe.Maybe String.String }

aliases.name: SavedToken
aliases.comment:
Persistent form of an `OAuthMiddleware.ResponseToken`.

Use `Gab.savedTokenFromResponseToken` to make one of these.
aliases.type: { expiresAt : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, refreshToken : Maybe.Maybe OAuth.Token, scope : List.List String.String, token : OAuth.Token }

aliases.name: Success
aliases.type: { state : Basics.Bool, message : String.String }

aliases.name: Topic
aliases.type: { id : String.String, created_at : String.String, is_featured : Basics.Bool, title : String.String, category : Basics.Int, user : Maybe.Maybe Gab.Types.User }

aliases.name: UnknownAttachmentRecord
aliases.type: { type_ : String.String, value : Json.Encode.Value }

aliases.name: UrlRecord
aliases.type: { image : String.String, title : Maybe.Maybe String.String, description : Maybe.Maybe String.String, url : String.String, source : String.String }

aliases.name: User
aliases.type: { id : String.String, name : String.String, username : String.String, picture_url : String.String, verified : Basics.Bool, is_pro : Basics.Bool, is_donor : Basics.Bool, is_investor : Basics.Bool, is_premium : Basics.Bool, is_private : Basics.Bool, is_tippable : Basics.Bool, is_accessible : Basics.Bool, created_at_month_label : Maybe.Maybe String.String, follower_count : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, following_count : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, post_count : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, picture_url_full : Maybe.Maybe String.String, following : Basics.Bool, followed : Basics.Bool, premium_price : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, follow_pending : Basics.Bool, unread_notification_count : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, stream : Basics.Bool, bio : Maybe.Maybe String.String, cover_url : Maybe.Maybe String.String, show_replies : Basics.Bool, sound_alerts : Basics.Bool, email : Maybe.Maybe String.String, notify_followers : Basics.Bool, notify_mentions : Basics.Bool, notify_likes : Basics.Bool, notify_reposts : Basics.Bool, broadcast_channel : Maybe.Maybe String.String, exclusive_features : Basics.Bool, social_facebook : Basics.Bool, social_twitter : Basics.Bool, is_pro_overdue : Basics.Bool, pro_expires_at : Maybe.Maybe String.String, has_chat : Basics.Bool, has_chat_unread : Basics.Bool, germany_law : Basics.Bool, language : Maybe.Maybe String.String, pinned_post_id : Maybe.Maybe String.String, nsfw_filter : Basics.Bool, hide_premium_content : Basics.Bool, score : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, video_count : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, is_favorited : Basics.Bool, subscribing : Basics.Bool, is_muted : Basics.Bool, can_downvote : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: UserList
aliases.type: { data : List.List Gab.Types.User, no_more : Basics.Bool }
